item.description:
Join us for the Couch to 5K training!
Whether you are a seasoned runner looking for some company or starting at the “Couch”, come join us at Braintree HS track every Monday and Wednesday evening. We have had so much success with this program in the past with dozens of “graduates”. The experienced runners offer support and examples of what is possible while newbies make incredible progress week to week! After a month, you will NOT believe how far you have come!

Even if you are just looking to get in a walk along the track and have others around you, please feel free to join in with this great group!

We are using CoolRunning.com for their Couch to 5K Training program. Full details are available at this link:
http://www.coolrunning.com/engine/2/2_3/181.shtml

We run in mist or light rain but this will be canceled due to HEAVY rains. We will be meeting on Monday and Wednesday evenings at Braintree HS track. This training expects 3 sessions per week, so please consider either completing the 3rd session on your own or by meeting up with others in the group on Friday or Saturday’s. The more you commit to yourself to complete this and remain consistent in training, the better success you will have!!

Braintree High School

6:30pm-- We will begin PROMPTLY at 6:30.

Monday and Wednesday evenings

Meeting at the Track, by the entrance at the bleachers

Organizer: Julie
MAX: 45

Guests: Welcome!

RSVP Deadline: Please finalize your RSVP by NOON on the day of the event. Please remember to rsvp. This is the only way you could be notified if this is canceled for any reason.

The schedule of this session is: (by week with Monday’s date)

Week 1: July 9th

Week 2: July 16th

Week 3: July 23rd

Week 4: July 30th

Week 5: August 6th

Week 6: August 13th

Week 7: August 20th

Week 8: August 27th

Week 9: September 3rd (No Meeting on Monday, Labor Day)

GRADUATION RACE!!:

group.name: The South Shore Fitness Meetup Group

item.name: Couch to 5K- 2012 session 2! Walkers & Joggers Welcome!
